|stockos = Linux;2.6.22;; |exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0, |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.33 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (9600 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 16-pin header,, unpopulated,, J4 |specialfeat = |flags = T1/E1 Interface, RTC w/ battery backup, metal case, |addchip = Four-channel E1/T1/J1 Framer & Line Interface;Infineon;PEF 22554;;1;,,,, I2C Real Time Clock;Intersil;ISL12026;;1;,,, 3-Port USB 2.0 Controller;NEC;μPD720102GC;;1;,,, 16-bit I2C-bus I/O port Expander;NXP;PCA9555;;1;,,, 2 Channel RS232 Interface;Analog Devices;ADM3202;;1;,,, Dual Port USB Power Switch;National Semiconductor;LM3526;;1;,,, DDR II Termination Regulator;Global Mixed-mode Technology;G2996;;1;,,, 16-bit D-type Transparent Latch w/ 3-State Input/Output;NXP;74LVC16373A;;2;,,, 3A, 24V Asynchronous Step‐Down DC/DC Converter;ZillTek;ZT1583;;2;,,, 5V/12V Synchronous-Rectified Buck Controller;uPI Semi;uP6101;;1;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;LVC244A;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = default |manuf = Unicomm |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Device has 4 T1/E1 RJ-45 interfaces. {{See also|Edgewater}} ==Links of Interest== *[ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/4550series/4552_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide]
